AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.paragraph1: Welcome to our platform! We are dedicated to providing you with the best financial management tools to help you achieve your goals.
AboutPage.paragraph2: Our mission is to simplify complex financial concepts and make them accessible to everyone, empowering you to make informed decisions about your money.
